timeline.message: Make the Wizard right navigation bar stick to the top of the page.
Responsively adjust the width of Shuffle box in New UI.
Make Grouping control and Auto-complete taxonomy full width in New UI

timeline.author: ChristianMurphy

replies.bodyText:
Are 4 layers of specificity needed here?
Is there a class on the select which could be used over a tag?

As far as I know, the select does not have its own class.
replies.author: PenghaiZhang

timeline.message:
Tweaks for CSS formats

Co-authored-by: Christian Murphy <christian.murphy.42@gmail.com>

Remove the styles on 'wizard-major-actions' so that Wizard action nav can
display properly in Moderation page;
Make sure the right nav is visible when the main content are is too wide.
